__e: - I know it sounds crazy, But in a way I'm almost glad I didn't make it my first try.
I think with the power and the money at this table, we can get it done in three.
And I know that if either one of us is going to make it in this life, it has to be on her own.
Who else could pull it off but you and me?
I guess you're too young to do it unless the victim's right here with you.
But a man like you could make it, if you have enough money.
